evs.metric.parameters
Class DoubleProcedureParameter

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.parameters.DoubleProcedureParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetricParameter, java.lang.Comparable
public class DoubleProcedureParameter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricParameter, java.lang.Comparable

Records a double procedure for applying a logical condition to a value.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Constant Field Values

BETWEEN

public static final int BETWEEN
Identifier for a between condition to be used on a threshold in defining an event from continuous data. The between condition is on the closed interval [a,b].

See Also:
Constant Field Values

par

protected DoubleProcedure par
The parameter value.

Constructor Detail

DoubleProcedureParameter

public DoubleProcedureParameter(IntegerParameter type,
                                DoubleParameter[] value,
                                ProbabilityIdentifierParameter areProbs,
                                BooleanParameter main)
Constructs an object with a specified type of logical condition and set of double parameters.

Parameters:
type - the type of logical condition
value - the value(s) to which the condition is applied
areProbs - is true if the thresholds are probabilities
main - is true if the threshold is a "main" threshold, false otherwise

DoubleProcedureParameter

                                DoubleParameter[] value,

                                BooleanParameter main,
                                StringParameter id)
Constructs an object with a specified type of logical condition and set of double parameters.

Parameters:
type - the type of logical condition
value - the value(s) to which the condition is applied
areProbs - is true if the thresholds are probabilities
main - is true if the threshold is a "main" threshold, false otherwise
id - an identifier to append to the string representation

hasRealValuesSet

public boolean hasRealValuesSet()
Returns true if real-values are available for the real-valued threshold or for the probability thresholds, false otherwise (i.e. if probability thresholds are defined and the corresponding real values have not been set).

Returns:
true if the threshold is available in real-values, false otherwise

getRealValuedEquivalent

public DoubleProcedureParameter getRealValuedEquivalent(double[][] climateCDF,
                                                        double nV)
Returns an equivalent parameter defined for real-values (using the specified climate CDF to determine probabilities) if the current parameter is defined for probabilities. Otherwise returns the same parameter. Throws an exception if real values are required and the input contains fewer than two samples from which to determine the real-values.

Parameters:
climateCDF - the climatology CDF from which to determine real values
nV - a null value to ignore
Returns:
an equivalent parameter defined for real-values

public MetricParameter deepCopy()
Returns a deep copy of the current metric parameter, where all instance variables occupy independent positions in memory from the current metric parameter.

Returns:
a deep copy of the current object

getRealValuesForProbs

public DoubleParameter[] getRealValuesForProbs()
                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Returns the real values for a probability procedure or throws an exception if the current procedure does not refer to probability values.

compareTo

public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
Returns a negative integer if the current object is less than the input object, zero if they are equal and a positive integer if the current object is greater than the input object. Throws an exception if the class of the input object is unexpected. Uses the lower threshold on a between condition.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
Parameters:
o - the object to compare
